Html:
Hi,

I have one sample project that I used to test the GMap control sucessfully in a Win CE device, then I added the component (GMapControl) to a project that I already had and it started freezing the equipament when I instantiate the GMapControl, after some investigation I added the DLL 'System.Data.SqlServerCe' in the test project that was working fine and it started freezing the equipment as well. I use this DLL in my project because I store data in a SQL Compact 3.5 database.

By freezing I mean that the app stops working, gets locked.

Is there any known incompatibility with this DLL?

Thank you.

P.S.: Changed to discussions as requested by radioman

Hi,

Actually I found out that the problem was in the OpenNetCF DLLs, I was using a newer version of the OpenNetCF (2.3.12004.0) while you look for the version 2.3.0.39.

After downgrading the OpenNetCF DLLs it started working.

Thank you.
excellent, i wonder whats wrong with the new version ;/
